title: M4CXR: Exploring Multi-task Potentials of Multi-modal Large Language Models for Chest X-ray Interpretation
details: J Park, S Kim, B Yoon, J Hyun, K Choi - arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.16213, 2024
abstract: The rapid evolution of artificial intelligence, especially in large language models (LLMs), has significantly impacted various domains, including healthcare. In chest X- ray (CXR) analysis, previous studies have employed LLMs, but with limitations: either …
